body_html:
IIUC, the PR you're referring to is #14098

I might be missing something but it seems that the BUILD target for the kernels //tensorflow/contrib/kafka:kafka_kernels isn't included as a dependency of any other target so the kernels are not being linked in.

@yongtang @jhseu , could you take a look? Should there be a kernel library DSO that is created and loaded at build time? Or, if not, the kafka kernels library target needs to be linked in somewhere, right?
